From: 'Glen Johnson' via PatchManagement <patchmanagement@googlegroups.com>
Sent: Wednesday, December 20, 2023 6:45 PM
To: ntsysadmin@googlegroups.com; patchmanagement@googlegroups.com
Subject: [External Sender] [patchmanagement] Thanks, merry Christmas and so
llong 
Greetings. 
Today is my last work day as network manager, IT coordinator and general
tech person at Virginia Highlands Community College where I have spent
the past 40 years.  I will officially retire on December 31 and am
looking forward to other adventures. 
I've been a member of the ntsysadmin list longer that I can think about
(my oldest saved email, a joke, from that list is dated 2006) and the
patch management list for several years also. 
I wanted to take a second to express a heart felt THANK YOU to all that
participate in both of these most helpful lists.  You have been an
invaluable part of making my career in IT a success. Thank you for
sharing your knowledge, advice and most of all, your time.  I can't
imagine being able to do half of what I did without this great resource. 
Merry Christmas to those of you that choose to celebrate this and best
wishes to everyone. 
May patch Tuesdays be calm and all your systems run smoothly over the
coming years. 
Take care and so long. 
Glen. 
--
Link: https://groups.google.com/d/msgid/patchmanagement/dc46a845739748569e2f1899bf188b16%40genedata.com
